summary: Implements the clientâ€‘side structures, constants and helper utilities required to communicate with the Active Directory Directory Replication Service (DRSUAPI) over DCE/RPC, handling replication metadata, security identifiers, attribute encryption, and related data parsing.
business_intent: Provides the building blocks for security tools, forensic utilities, and administrative scripts to query, replicate, or manipulate Active Directory objects via the DRSUAPI interface, facilitating domain enumeration, replication analysis and credential extraction.
